body_html:
I tried to fix the Variable vs LongTensor issue, but seems like EmbeddingBag doesn't support 2D tensors at all!

In torch/nn/modules/sparse.py, line 149, there is an assertion that the input indices are of dimension = 1:

assert indices.dim() == 1
body_text:
I tried to fix the Variable vs LongTensor issue, but seems like EmbeddingBag doesn't support 2D tensors at all!
In torch/nn/modules/sparse.py, line 149, there is an assertion that the input indices are of dimension = 1:
assert indices.dim() == 1
body:
I tried to fix the Variable vs LongTensor issue, but seems like EmbeddingBag doesn't support 2D tensors at all! 

In torch/nn/modules/sparse.py, line 149, there is an assertion that the input indices are of dimension = 1:

`assert indices.dim() == 1`
